item.title: mysql8.4 清空 binlog 并重置序号
item.description: 参考: https://blog.axiaoxin.com/post/how-to-disable-mysql-binlog/ # 登录到 mysql 后 # 查看日志文件 show binary logs; # 清空全部 binlogs 并重置索引(编号, 0001,0002,0003,...) RESET BINARY LOGS AND GTIDS;
